attributes.action: Asthmatics should be able to be prescribed inhalers free on the NHS
attributes.background: Asthmatics currently have to pay £8.20 per inhaler, why should we have to pay to breathe? Iv made this petition due to recent talks about making e cigarettes available on the NHS. In my eyes smoking/drug taking is a lifestyle choice, we don't choose to have asthma, we're just stuck with it!

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106345

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
